content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=35-41, y=-83 to -87)
Complex mining setup consisting of:
- 4 Burner mining drills mining coal at positions (37.0,-85.0), (39.0,-85.0), (41.0,-86.0), (41.0,-83.0)
- Wooden chests collecting coal at positions (36.5,-86.5), (39.5,-83.5), (40.5,-87.5)
- Burner inserters transferring coal between components at positions (35.5,-86.5), (35.5,-85.5)

### Iron/Copper Mining & Smelting at position(x=-28, y=-61)
Mining and smelting setup consisting of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0,-61.0) mining iron and copper ore
- Stone furnace at (-27.0,-58.0) for smelting
- Wooden chest at (-27.5,-59.5) collecting ore
- Burner inserters at (-26.5,-59.5) and (-25.5,-58.5) transferring materials
- Additional furnaces at (-23.0,-58.0), (-21.0,-58.0) with associated inserters
- Output chest at (-24.5,-58.5) collecting plates

### Iron Mining Complex at position(x=-10 to -6, y=-59)
Large iron mining setup with:
- 3 Burner mining drills at (-10.0,-59.0), (-8.0,-59.0), (-6.0,-59.0)
- Wooden chests collecting ore at (-9.5,-57.5), (-7.5,-57.5), (-5.5,-57.5)
- Multiple burner inserters coordinating material movement
- Transport belt system connecting components

### Smelting Array at position(x=0-6, y=0)
Large smelting setup consisting of:
- 4 Stone furnaces at (0.0,0.0), (2.0,0.0), (4.0,0.0), (6.0,0.0)
- Input chests at (0.5,-2.5), (2.5,-2.5), (4.5,-2.5), (6.5,-2.5)
- Output chests at (0.5,2.5), (2.5,2.5), (4.5,2.5), (6.5,2.5)
- Complex inserter network coordinating material movement

### Power Generation System at position(x=-3.5 to 4.5, y=17-27)
Power generation setup with:
- Offshore pump at (-3.5,27.5) providing water
- Boiler at (-1.5,22.0) heating water
- Steam engine at (4.5,20.5) generating power
- Pipe network connecting components
- Electric pole network distributing power

# ERROR TIPS

### Extraction errors
- Cannot extract from empty or non-existent containers
- Ensure the target chest contains the items you want to extract before attempting extraction

### Entity placement optimization
- Many burner mining drills and inserters are out of fuel - implement better fuel distribution system
- Several inserters are waiting for source items - ensure proper material flow between components

### Fluid system issues
- Steam engine shows "no input liquid" warning - verify pipe connections between boiler and engine
- Ensure continuous water supply from offshore pump to boiler

### Production flow issues
- Multiple "waiting for source items" warnings on inserters - optimize material flow between components
- Some chests are reaching full capacity - implement better output handling
